answers.answer: dude, dolphinsman i feel your fear, but you've done the test, you KNOW your status buddy , try not to keep worrying you are fine.

thanks man...but why are you so confident? what else could possibly cause all these problems??? i mean i don't have cancer or anything like that to lower my immune system or diabetes...what else could it possibly be???

this forum is hiv specific and you do NOT have a hiv concern.kindly move on...no one here can diagnose you.  see your doctor ! !dr hhh's reply to you:Anxiety driven irrational comments by people who will not or cannot accep the reassurance we have given are not welcome.  Any more and I will delete the entire thread without further comment
* Any member who creates a second nickname will immediately be banned and have any subsequent nicknames banned.
He doesn't have and HIV concern.

i am confident becuase you have tested negative; multiple times!i am not a doctor so couldnt not tell you whats wrong with you. but maybe should inquire about what has caused all of these symptoms, they certainly have no relation to HIV you know that.

change ur mind find some thing else to thinck of like i love my self       and when something in ur mind was to talk about hiv           say stop stop stop i dont have it repeat that in ur mind

question: I had every symptom in the book for ARS and now progressive HIV...here is the timeline of everything I've gone through...I've repeatedly tested negative but have every symptom in the book for HIV...how the he.ll is this NOT hiv???someone help!!!!!!!!!!!28 year old hetero male w history of HIV symptoms but neg antibody tests...timeline and symptoms.02/06 - unprot 1 night stand w girl2 weeks later - fever, chills, headache, etc 4 days - discomfort in genital area...neg for stds. 6 months later diagnosed w prostatitis - 3 months antibiotics up to december 0608/06 - 8 neg anti tests - all but 1 rapid up to 6 months12/06 - strep like illness - neg rapid strep - took antibiotics and symp gone in week10/06 - unprot sex with coworker and protect with new girl01/07 - Vegas - make out w stripper for 2-3 min & she stroked my penis01/07 - heavy makeout w girl at bar - protected sex for 5 min02/07 - 18 days later - intense illness very high fever, chills, headache, sore muscles/joints, swollen/painful nodes in neck, white creamy stuff on tonsils & back of throat, vomit, diarreah (diarrhea) - no flu or strep, neg mono - given levaquin - sympt go away in 2 days - post viral tingling, etc in extremeties confirm by doc...gone in 2 weeks - no diagnosis of illness - 3 months later ID doc - pos EBV igg but neg igm8 neg anti tests HIV 1/O/2 up to 1 yr later08/07 - similar illness as last but no ER or antibiotics - symptoms gone 5 days on own04/08 - diagnosed w molluscum stomach, genital area - treated/gone01/09 - tonsils out - no sickness since03/09 - new girlfriend - still together now - no sex in last 4+ months scared to give her HIV06/10 - tingling, burning, numb, etc in extremeties - doc says neuropathy - no diabetes, b12 ok08/10 - neg HIV 1/O/2 labcorp, negative rapid test from clinic09/10 - had emg and mri of head/neck done...all tests showed normalnow - very tired, intense burning in feet still, tingling in feet and hands and now I have a few molluscum back but on my neck! this is extremely rare to happen in people who don't have an immune deficiencyI've been tested for everything and I mean everything!!! it all comes back normal yet I still feel like this and I the four horrible illnesses and the molluscum...how is this NOT hiv??????????
title: Still don't understand...how is this NOT hiv?
